# jupyterlab_celltests
Cell-by-cell testing for production Jupyter notebooks in JupyterLab

[![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/jupyterlab_celltests.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/jupyterlab_celltests)
